means: （印度、巴基斯坦、斯里兰卡等国的货币单位）卢比( rupee的名词复数 )

sentence.Network_en: Each family is being given a cash handout of six thousand rupees.
sentence.Network_cn: 每户都领到6,000卢比的救济金。

sentence.Network_en: Foreign investors are to be allowed to repatriate profits over one billion rupees.
sentence.Network_cn: 外国投资者将被允许将利润额超过10亿卢比的部分调回国内。

PerfectNetExp.abs: such a move will enable any household to buy and sell gold in units for as little as 1,000 rupees and these units could be traded in the same manner as mutual fund units , he said .这样的行动将使任何家庭能够买并且用价值少达1，000卢比的单位出售金，这些件可能被作为共同基金单位同样买卖，他说。
an indian engineer says the auction was " a farce " and that it is impossible to build a solid plant and operate it for less than 10 rupees .一位印度工程师说拍卖会只是一场闹剧，建立一个固定的工厂并以低于每度10卢比的价格运营它，这是不可能的。

entry.tran: 卢比（印度、巴基斯坦等国的货币单位）
entry.def: A rupee is a unit of money that is used in India, Pakistan, and some other countries.
